name: code-interpreter
description: Execute JavaScript code in a sandboxed environment using Node.js vm module. Supports capturing console output and enforces a 10-second timeout for safe execution.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: code_interpreter
toolDefinition.description: Execute code in a sandboxed environment. Supports JavaScript (executed via Node.js vm module) and Python (requires python3 binary). Returns captured stdout output and execution metadata.

language.description: The programming language of the code to execute
